page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart definition map object
page.description: Definition of a data map to convert raw data into a format useable by the charting logic.

property.name: name
property.description: The name of the mapped data. This is needed when more then one set of data maps is used in a chart, and is used in the output to specify which data map a given layer of the chart should use.

property.name: filter
property.description: Function to use to filter the raw data to only use a portion of it. The function will be called with each array item from teh raw data and will also get the "temp" object passed in.

property.name: group
property.description: The definition of how to group the raw data. See *[link:A5.u.array.group]*.

property.name: dimensions
property.description: The definition of the dimensions to map from the raw data into the mapped data. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Map Object - Dimension Object]*.
